pkgmetadata.longdescription: Precise and Accurate Power of the Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney Rank-Sum Test for a Continuous Variable // Power calculator for the two- sample Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney rank-sum test for a continuous outcome (Mollan, Trumble, Reifeis et. al., Mar. 2020) doi:10.1080/10543406.2020.1730866 arXiv:1901.04597, (Mann and Whitney 1947) doi:10.1214/aoms/1177730491, (Shieh, Jan, and Randles 2006) doi:10.1080/10485250500473099.
